title: 有無會計巴打教我做cash flow statement

replies.msg:
是咁的我唔係好識做gain/loss from disposal of equipment個part
suppose我有件equip 15000,用左4年,net value=3000(life time =5yrs)
咁件equip我拎去trade in for 20000, 再issue 90000 shares去換左塊110000既land

咁成件事係cash flow statement 度係唔係

operating: gain on sale of eq: 17000

invest: sale of eq : 20000

note : issue of shares in exchange of land : 90000


事關我有份功課要做cfs 但計黎計去條數都差8k所以上黎問下巴打
